member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Hosting.RazorCompiledItemLoader
member.summary: A loader implementation that can load objects from an using reflection.

remarks.para: Inherit from to customize the behavior when loading objects from an . The default implementations of methods defined by this class use reflection in a trivial way to load attributes from the assembly.
Inheriting from is useful when an implementation needs to consider additional configuration or data outside of the being loaded.
Subclasses of can return subclasses of with additional data members by overriding .

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Hosting.RazorSourceChecksumAttribute
member.summary: Specifies the checksum of a source file that contributed to a compiled item.

remarks.para: These attributes are added by the Razor infrastructure when generating code to assist runtime implementations to determine the integrity of compiled items.
Runtime implementations should access the checksum metadata for an item using .
